ComicInfo.Penciller: Dave Kendall,Eoin Coveney,Henry Flint,Jake Lynch,Mark Harrison,Sean O'Connor
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Dark Judges return in a new series in the latest issue of 2000 AD – out on Wednesday from all good Thrill-merchants! In this week’s edition of the Galaxy’s Greatest Comic: Judge Dredd – Enceladus; Old Life by Rob Williams, Henry Flint, and Annie Parkhouse; Grey Area: Contact by Dan Abnett, Mark Harrison, and Ellie De Ville; Dreams of Deadworld by Kek-W, Dave Kendall, and Ellie De Ville; The Alienist: The Haunting of Hex House by Gordon Rennie, Emma Beeby, Eoin Coveney, and Simon Bowland; Tharg’s 3rillers: Apocalypse Anonymous by Robert Murphy, Sean O’Connor, Abigail Ryder, and Annie Parkhouse!
Cover: Dave Kendall
Judge Dredd - Enceladus: Old Life (Part Seven) (Rob Williams - Henry Flint)The Alienist - The Haunting of Hex House (Part Three) (Gordon Rennie - Emma Beeby - Eoin Coveney)Tharg's 3rillers: Apocalypse Anonymous (Part Two) (Robert Murphy - Sean O'Connor)Grey Area - First Bite (Dan Abnett - Mark Harrison)Dreams of Deadworld - Fire (Kek-W - Dave Kendall)
